verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6635>host,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> shall be the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> about the most holy <S%H6944>things:<s%> <S%H6944><s%>

And when the <S%H4264>camp<s%> setteth <S%H5265>forward,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and they shall take <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H4539>covering<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6532>veil,<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%> with it:

And shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> the <S%H3681>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H4480>over<s%> <S%H4605><s%> it a <S%H899>cloth<s%> <S%H3632>wholly<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and shall <S%H7760>put<s%> in the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof.

And <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H6440>shewbread<s%> they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7086>dishes,<s%> and the <S%H3709>spoons,<s%> and the <S%H4518>bowls,<s%> and <S%H7184>covers<s%> to <S%H5262>cover<s%> withal: and the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thereon: <S%H5921><s%>

And they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the same with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall put <S%H7760>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof.

And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> of the <S%H3974>light,<s%> and his <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> and his <S%H4457>tongs,<s%> and his <S%H4289>censers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, <S%H834>wherewith<s%> they <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto it:

And they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof <S%H413>within<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H4132>bar.<s%>

And <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall <S%H7725>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> to the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof:

And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H8335>ministry,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> they <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H413>in<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> them with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> a bar: <S%H4132><s%>
And they shall take away the <S%H1878>ashes<s%> <S%H853><s%> from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H899>cloth<s%> thereon: <S%H5921><s%>

And they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>it<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, <S%H834>wherewith<s%> they <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> it, <S%H853>even<s%> the <S%H4289>censers,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4207>fleshhooks,<s%> and the <S%H3257>shovels,<s%> and the <S%H4219>basins,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it a <S%H3681>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> to the <S%H905>staves<s%> of it.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3680>covering<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> as the <S%H4264>camp<s%> is to set <S%H5265>forward;<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> it: but they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H413><s%> any holy <S%H6944>thing,<s%> lest they <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> things are the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And to the <S%H6486>office<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> pertaineth the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> and the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and the <S%H8548>daily<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H6486>oversight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> therein is, in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and in the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Cut ye not <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the Levites: <S%H3881><s%>

But <S%H2063>thus<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them, that they may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> when they <S%H5066>approach<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the most holy <S%H6944>things:<s%> <S%H6944><s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall go <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H7760>appoint<s%> them every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> his <S%H5656>service<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his burden: <S%H4853><s%>
But they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853>when<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> are <S%H1104>covered,<s%> lest they <S%H4191>die.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> throughout the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shalt thou <S%H6485>number<s%> them; <S%H3605>all<s%> that enter <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H6633>perform<s%> the <S%H5656>service,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve,<s%> and for burdens: <S%H4853><s%>

And they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> his <S%H4372>covering,<s%> and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the badgers' <S%H8476>skins<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%>

And the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of their <S%H5656>service,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6213>made<s%> for them: so shall they <S%H5647>serve.<s%>

At <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6310>appointment<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4853>burdens,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service:<s%> and ye shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> them in <S%H4931>charge<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4853>burdens.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1649>Gershon<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and their <S%H4931>charge<s%> shall be under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>
As for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> thou shalt <S%H6485>number<s%> them after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shalt thou <S%H6485>number<s%> them, every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H935>entereth<s%> into the <S%H6635>service,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of their <S%H4853>burden,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation;<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> thereof, and <S%H134>sockets<s%> thereof,

And the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and their <S%H3489>pins,<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3627>instruments,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service:<s%> and by <S%H8034>name<s%> ye shall <S%H6485>reckon<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of their <S%H4853>burden.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service,<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> and after the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H935>entereth<s%> into the <S%H6635>service,<s%> for the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>
And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them by their <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that might do <S%H5647>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> did <S%H6485>number<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> and by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H935>entereth<s%> into the <S%H6635>service,<s%> for the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%>

Even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that might do <S%H5647>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> did <S%H6485>number<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H935>entereth<s%> into the <S%H6635>service,<s%> for the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%>
Even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> be those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
